function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Fear of disease transmission leading to extermination of local populations of species","Impact":"Loss of biodiversity and disruption of ecosystems","Mitigation":"Education and awareness campaigns to dispel misconceptions about disease transmission and conservation measures","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, social media, and online education resources","People":"Local communities, conservation organizations, and government agencies","Owner":"Conservation organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Reduction in monitoring data due to closures and social distancing restrictions","Impact":"Inability to assess the health of ecosystems and track changes in biodiversity","Mitigation":"Utilizing remote monitoring technologies and developing alternative data collection methods","Technologies":"Remote sensing, satellite imagery, and unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs)","People":"Conservation researchers, environmental agencies, and technology developers","Owner":"Conservation researchers, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Reduced funding and income for conservation activities and local communities","Impact":"Diminished capacity to support conservation efforts and loss of livelihoods for local communities","Mitigation":"Diversifying funding sources, implementing sustainable tourism practices, and supporting alternative livelihoods","Technologies":"Blockchain for transparent funding, sustainable tourism apps, and community-based enterprise platforms","People":"Conservation organizations, local communities, and funding agencies","Owner":"Conservation organizations, funding agencies"}]}
